definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: I can find the zip code in the phone book.
sentences.chinese: 我可以在電話簿上找到郵遞區號。

sentences.english: This information can be found by using your zip code or IP address.
sentences.chinese: 這方面的資料可以發現，用您的郵遞區號或IP地址。

sentences.english: Do the same for the shipping postal code.
sentences.chinese: 對郵遞區號進行同樣的操作。

sentences.english: Search by city or postal code for a store near you.
sentences.chinese: 按城市或郵遞區號搜尋附近的店鋪。

sentences.english: Well, I wrote Illinois zip codes on the out-of -state addresses.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我把伊利諾的郵遞區號，寫在別州的地址上。
